com.badlogic.gdx.graphics
Interface RenderListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccelerometerTest, AudioDecodingTest, JoglApplication, TriangleTest
public interface RenderListener

A RenderListener can be hooked to a Application and will receive setup, render and dispose events. In case of a setup event the listener can create any resources it needs later on to draw. The render method is called whenever the Application is redrawn. The dispose method is called before the Application is closed or the RenderListener is unregistered from the application. The methods will be invoked in the rendering thread of the application and not in the UI thread!

Author:
mzechner@know-center.at

Method Summary
 void dispose(Application application)
          The dispose method is called when the application is closing or the RenderListener has been unregistered form the application.
 void render(Application application)
          The render method is called every time a new frame should be rendered.
 void setup(Application application)
          The setup method is called once upon initialization of the Application
